articles.title: Brutal heat from Phoenix to Boston triggers alerts for 100 million
articles.description: About 60 million Americans in at least 16 states are set to experience triple-digit highs.
articles.content:

articles.author: Annie Karni
articles.title: House Passes Bill to Codify Contraception Rights After Dobbs
articles.description: The vote was mostly along party lines, with all but eight Republicans in opposition to a bill that aims to protect a right seen as newly at risk after the overturning of Roe v. Wade.
articles.content:

articles.author: Whitney Wild, Jeremy Herb
articles.title: First on CNN: DHS inspector general tells Secret Service to stop investigating potentially missing texts
articles.description: The Department of Homeland Security inspector general has directed the Secret Service to stop its internal investigations into what happened to text messages related to January 6 that may have been deleted, according to a letter reviewed by CNN.

articles.author: Jeffrey C. Kummer, Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs
articles.title: Thomas Lane Sentenced for Violating George Floyd’s Civil Rights
articles.description: Mr. Lane, 39, helped to hold Mr. Floyd down while another officer fatally knelt on his neck. He was the only officer to suggest they should roll Mr. Floyd on his side so he could breathe.
articles.content: ST. PAUL, Minn. Thomas Lane, a former Minneapolis police officer who held down George Floyds legs as he gasped for air while dying under the knee of another officer, was sentenced to two and a half y… [+956 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Rhett Miller
articles.title: 15-foot-long snake shot by cops while wrapped around owner's neck
articles.description: A massive snake wrapped itself around the neck of a Pennsylvania man, prompting responding cops to shoot the pet in the head, police said.
articles.content:
A massive snake wrapped itself around the neck of a Pennsylvania man, prompting responding cops to shoot the pet in the head, police said.

articles.title: Video shows passengers trying to escape Orange Line train fire
articles.description: Several passengers escaped a burning MBTA Orange Line train on a bridge.

articles.author: Tierney Sneed and Katelyn Polantz, CNN
articles.title: Takeaways from Day 3 of the Steve Bannon contempt of Congress trial
articles.description: Prosecutors rested their case against Steve Bannon on the third day of his trial, having kept to an approach to keep things simple and straightforward for the jury.
articles.content: Prosecutors rested their case against Steve Bannon on the third day of his trial, having kept to an approach to keep things simple and straightforward for the jury.
